title: After Hours

description.plain:
“After Hours” samples the 2004 hit “Move Ya Body”, by Nina Sky.

Another sample found in the intro is taken from the 1987 BAD album with the song titled “Liberian Girl” by Michael Jackson.

The song is all about Kehlani telling this person to stay with them in the after hours so they can be together for a little more. The song is set to be in a club so that’s why the song has an upbeat tempo.

embed_content: Read “After Hours” by Kehlani on Genius

body.plain:
“After Hours” samples the 2004 hit “Move Ya Body”, by Nina Sky.

Another sample found in the intro is taken from the 1987 BAD album with the song titled “Liberian Girl” by Michael Jackson.

The song is all about Kehlani telling this person to stay with them in the after hours so they can be together for a little more. The song is set to be in a club so that’s why the song has an upbeat tempo.
